summary: In war-torn Eastern Europe, a world-weary group of mercenaries discover a long-hidden secret in an abandoned WWII bunker.
cast: Ray Stevenson|Julian Wadham|Richard Brake|Paul Blair|Brett Fancy|Enoch Frost|Julian Rivett|Michael Smiley|Johnny Meres|Xuki Robeli|Mark Smith|Graeme Temple|Charlie Jeffrey|Fergus Johnston|Matt McClure|Leo Horsfield|Scott Peden
title: Outpost
